activities: Bitium collects and stores any information customers enter when asking for more information about Bitium Services, registering for and using Bitium Services, or provided to us in any other way. When registering for a user account, customers are required to enter their name and email address, along other information. Customers are also required to create a unique username and a password, which will be used solely for the purpose of providing access to their user account. Customer name and email address will be used to inform you of new services, releases, upcoming events, and material changes to the Privacy Policy.
personaldata: Name, email address, IP address, and information entered by customers directly into the Bitium internet  application
privacyprograms: A self-regulatory privacy program that adheres to the Safe Harbor Privacy Principles
recoursemech: Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC) to investigate unresolved complaints.
